content.html: AGPLv3 wasn't designed to guarantee that anyone will "contribute back." It was designed to guarantee that the permissions required for Software Freedom will be given to those who access software over a network. It's about "paying forward" to users not "paying back" to authors.
content.value: AGPLv3 wasn't designed to guarantee that anyone will "contribute back." It was designed to guarantee that the permissions required for Software Freedom will be given to those who access software over a network. It's about "paying forward" to users not "paying back" to authors.
